pull.title: refactor: Avoid UniValue copy constructor
pull.body:
Remove unnecessary `UniValue` copies. Not sure if this change is exhaustive without changing `UniValue` or if there is a way to detect that.

A followup is to add move semantics to `UniValue` and remove some unnecessary members of `UniValue`.

This work is related to #15925.

events.body: [UniValue](https://github.com/jgarzik/univalue) constructor improvements welcomed...   a version 2.0 that ditches old APIs (no impact on bitcoin) is scheduled, fwiw.

issue.title: univalue: Drop overloaded members
issue.body:
Since `UniValue` constructors aren't marked `explicit` then these overloaded auxiliary members are unnecessary. This change also avoids some unnecessary `UniValue` copies.

Related to #15974.

events.body: Concept ACK - some NullUniValue changes could be scripted to be verifiably consistent and comprehensive

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#16251](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16251.html) (Improve signrawtransaction error reporting by ajtowns)
* [#16240](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16240.html) (JSONRPCRequest-aware RPCHelpMan by kallewoof)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
